com.novartis.opensource.yada.format

Class AbstractConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.format.AbstractConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSystemResultJSONConverter, RESTResultDelimitedConverter, RESTResultJSONConverter, ResultSetResultDelimitedConverter, ResultSetResultJSONConverter, ResultSetResultXMLConverter, SOAPResultXMLConverter

    public abstract class AbstractConverter
extends Object
implements Converter
    Base implemetation of Converter interface.
    Author:
    David Varon

      • convert

        public Object convert(Object result)
               throws YADAConverterException
        Description copied from interface: Converter
        Intended to take raw results from a query and wrap or transform them into the proper format, including the mapping of fields based on provided harmonyMap specification
        Specified by:
        convert in interface Converter
        Parameters:
        result - the raw query results
        Returns:
        the converted result
        Throws:
        YADAConverterException - when result conversion fails

      • convert

        public Object convert(Object o,
             String colsep,
             String recsep)
               throws YADAConverterException
        Base implemetation returns null.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface Converter
        Parameters:
        o - the raw query result
        colsep - the column delimiter
        recsep - the line delimiter
        Returns:
        the converted, delimited result
        Throws:
        YADAConverterException - when result conversion fails
